entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
